title: any round for pessat counselling left ?

comments.body:
Yep its gonna be on Nov5th

curious to know... which clg did you join?
Is it officially announced to be on Nov5th? Source

it is a bit risky... but there is a good possibility... you should also check with PES directly and ask them..

why did you leave this decision so late ?  just curious... 

you don't have too much time to leverage.

VIT vellore is also a good college.. Did you get thru Catg-1 or Catg-2 ? if you got thru catg-1, the fees also will be lower as compared to PES.
